entries.headline: Fresh roleplay seeds
entries.blurb: Planted the `qwen-character` model for better roleplay and pruned the unstable `flux-2-dev`. The garden is looking sharper.

entries.headline: Docs meet Play
entries.blurb: Moved the library right next to the playground! Now you can check the docs without flying away from the Play page.

entries.headline: Gemini logic tune-up
entries.blurb: Fixed Gemini's wiring so code blocks run smooth and reasoning is clear. The logic flows like nectar now.

entries.headline: Polly gets wiser
entries.blurb: Gave Polly a shield against prompt leakage and a boost to critical thinking. She's got strong, independent bee energy today.
